name: Philip Bayard Crosby
background: Born Wheeling WV. Navy WWII/Korea. Worked Crosley, Bendix, Martin Co (Pershing missile QC - invented Zero Defects reducing scrap 30%). ITT VP Quality. Founded Philip Crosby Associates 1979. Authored 14 books starting Quality is Free (1979).

principles.name: 14 Steps to Quality Improvement
principles.description: Management commitment → team → measurement → awareness → zero defects day → recognition → repeat.
principles.falsification: When 14 steps to quality improvement leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Prevention, Not Inspection
principles.description: Build quality in via process design; inspection only catches problems after creation.
principles.falsification: When prevention, not inspection leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Quality Measured by Price of Nonconformance (PONC)
principles.description: Costs of defects/rework/scrap > prevention costs. 'Quality is Free' - savings exceed investment.
principles.falsification: When quality measured by price of nonconformance (ponc) leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Quality is Conformance to Requirements
principles.description: Quality = meeting specs/customer expectations exactly, not 'goodness' or elegance.
principles.falsification: When quality is conformance to requirements leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
